en.today: Your natural habits come into focus, dear Aries, as Venus aligns with the nodes of fate. Consider if you've fallen off track with your wellness journey, and where adjustments can be made. Meanwhile, the Pisces moon and Mars form a supportive aspect, bringing passion to your most private connections. A fierce desire to empower the self also comes into play, and you could feel called to work on essential projects from behind the scenes. Luna and the Libra sun enter an unbalanced aspect midafternoon, highlighting if certain relationships have lost steam and are in need of some excitement.

en.today: You could suffer from buyer's remorse or financial regrets, dearest Leo, as Venus aligns with the nodes of fate. This cosmic climate acts as a wake-up call to get serious about your finances and investment in the future. If you're on the cusp of a romantic commitment, ensure that you and your partner are on the same fiscal page. As the Pisces moon and Mars align, your connections and sense of empowerment will directly influence one another. Tap into your intuition before making a decision that might be difficult to reverse later. Notice if others try to twist your words or generate confusion when the sun and Luna form an unbalanced aspect midafternoon.

en.today: Return to your roots as Venus aligns with the nodes of fate, dearest Taurus, connecting with friends from the past. These vibes also encourage artistic expression, though you might gain more from attending classes or collaborating with fellow creatives than going solo. The Pisces moon makes it easier to fit in, so don't be shy if group activities call out to you. Meanwhile, Mars stirs in the sector of your chart that governs love, increasing your chances of finding or livening up romantic connections. Catch up on chores and give yourself a chance to recharge at home once the sun and Luna form an unbalanced aspect later this afternoon.

en.today: Venus aligns with the nodes' fate, darling Gemini, highlighting which areas of your life need more love and attention. As the weekend finally kicks off, use this energy to reconnect with family and close friends. Though the Pisces moon could make it challenging to ignore professional responsibilities, remember that it's important to cultivate healthy boundaries between work and off-hours. A creative ambiance circulates later today when the sun and Luna form an unbalanced aspect, but you might get stuck if you spend too much time thinking through your ideas, instead of simply playing in the artistic process.
